articles.title: Many Americans still aren't coming to Canada. Is the ArriveCAN app to blame? - CBC News
articles.description: Although travel is resurging, the number of Americans making road trips to Canada was still down by close to half over the past two months. The mayor and several businesses in Niagara Falls, Ont., say the ArriveCAN app is keeping many of them away.
articles.content:
Post-pandemic, tourists have returned to Niagara Falls.
But something's missing  a lot of Americans, even though the popular Ontario tourist destination sits right next to the U.S. border. 
"It's d… [+5098 chars]

articles.title: Democracy in the US is ‘under assault’ by MAGA Republicans, Joe Biden says - TheJournal.ie
articles.description: The leader called Donald Trump and his allies an extremist threat to America and its future.
articles.content:
US PRESIDENT JOE Biden warned that equality and democracy are under assault in the US as he sounded an alarm about his predecessor, Donald Trump.

articles.title: Biden calls Trump and MAGA Republicans a threat to 'the very foundations of America' - CBC News
articles.description: U.S. President Joe Biden warned Thursday that "equality and democracy are under assault" in the U.S, sounding an alarm about his predecessor, Donald Trump, and "MAGA Republican" adherents.
